info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 02 at 5:03PM EDT until June 02 at 5:45PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 PM EDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN CUMBERLAND AND NORTHWESTERN PRINCE EDWARD COUNTIES... At 502 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Evergreen, or over Appomattox, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and powerlines. This severe storm will be near... Prospect around 535 PM EDT. Farmville, Hampden Sydney and Longwood University around 545 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Kingsville, Raines Tavern, Briery Creek Lake, Tuggle, Elam, Reeds, Allens Mill and Worsham. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
